    • StateMain

      public void StateMain(ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips, ShipBoard shipBoard, int playerID, int indextopreserve, int waste) throws Exception
      Executes the main actions associated with the current state of the game, modifying the game state based on the input parameters.
      Specified by:
      StateMain in class RemoveTileState
      Parameters:
      subShips - a 2D list of SpaceShipTile objects representing the current state and configuration of the sub-ships.
      shipBoard - the ShipBoard object representing the current state of the game board.
      playerID - the identifier of the player performing the action.
      indextopreserve - the index of an element that should be preserved during the operation.
      waste - an additional integer parameter that can be used to determine further state behavior or tracking.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the execution of the state logic.

    • StateMain

      public void StateMain(ShipBoard shipBoard, int row, int col, boolean fromMistake) throws Exception
      Handles the primary logic for removing a tile from the spaceship board, including processing any effects or updates caused by the removal, such as modifying nearby tiles, updating the game state, and interacting with the event bus.
      Specified by:
      StateMain in class RemoveTileState
      Parameters:
      shipBoard - The current state of the spaceship board used for accessing and modifying tiles.
      row - The row index of the tile to be removed.
      col - The column index of the tile to be removed.
      fromMistake - Indicates whether the tile removal was triggered due to a mistake.
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown if any errors occur during the execution of the method or if the operation fails.

    • chooseOneSubShip

      public void chooseOneSubShip(int index, int playerID) throws Exception
      Allows a player to select one subship from the available subships. It validates the player's input and ensures the action is performed by the correct player. If the input is invalid or the player is incorrect, appropriate events are triggered.
      Specified by:
      chooseOneSubShip in class RemoveTileState
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the subship to be chosen from the list of subships
      playerID - the unique identifier of the player attempting to make the selection
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the selection process or notification of events
